conclusion: Determine the output power of the power source when connected to resistor R.
Identify the intersection point of the two lines as the operating point.
The intersection point of line I and line II is at U = 2 V and I = 2 A.
Calculate the output power P using P = U × I.
Substitute values to find P = 2 V × 2 A = 4 W.
The output power of the power source is 4 W.
